svg.style: font-family:Lato, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, 'Liberation Sans', sans-serif;font-feature-settings:"liga", "kern", "calt", "lnum";text-rendering:geometricPrecision;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;font-size:18px;background-color:#ffffff

a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: World crude oil price vs. oil consumption

text.style: font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Global crude oil price, measured in US dollars per cubic meter, against total oil consumption, measured in
average cubic meters per day. Prices are adjusted for inflation.

text.style: font-size: 13px; line-height: 1
font-size: 13px; line-height: 1
text.tspan: Crude oil price (US$ per cubic meter)

text.style: font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Data source: Energy Institute based on S&P Global Platts - Statistical Review of World Energy (2025); Energy Institute - Statistical Review of

text.style: font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: Note: Prices are expressed in constant 2022 US$.
